ProductInfo.Features:
Powered by 1/3" Sony Effio CCD Technology. Color DSP image sensor
High resolution: 700 horizontal Lines. Built-in f 3.5 - 8mm Varifocal Lens
17 IR leds for night vision. Mini Illumination: 0 Lux (IR leds on)
Lens adjustment: horizontal rotation of 355 degrees and vertical rotation of 45 degrees by manual
Power require: 12V DC 500ma power supply or above (sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Security Camera Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD 700TVL High Resolution Zoom Dome Day Night Vision 17 IR Infrared LEDs 3.5-8mm Varifocal Lens for DVR Home CCTV Surveillance System with Bonus Warning Sticker AC5
